name: News Aggregator
author: twicetwomedia

sections.description:
Get real-time news for your site. Easily display real-time news by topic on your website. This plugin offers simple news aggregation feeds that can be displayed anywhere on your site. Choose a topic and easily display relevant and current news for your users.

News topics to choose from: Trending, Astronomy, Business, Culture, Economy, Entertainment, Environment, Food, Health, Investing, Lifestyle, Movies, Music, Personal Finance, Politics, Science, Sports, Technology, Travel, Weird, World.
sections.installation:
Simply upload the News Aggregator plugin and activate News Aggregator within wp-admin settings.

Links

  • Detailed installation and implementation guide.
sections.faq:
Is News Aggregator free to use?

Yes. You can make use of our plugin for free by getting a free API key, you will have free, unlimited access to our Trending News feed.

Am I free to choose any news topic from the list?

Repeating above: If you opt to use our plugin and news aggregation for free by utilizing a free API key, you will have free, unlimited access to the Trending News feed. If you wish to add news to your site from one of our other 15+ categories, consider purchasing one of our affordable paid plans. All paid plans include a free 7-day trial.

Resources
In-depth Details About Our News Aggregation API
Detailed Plugin Installation & Implementation Guide
